interpretation:
The "Open Hands" card signifies an openness to receiving and giving. It suggests a generous and giving nature, as well as a willingness to let go of control. The hands are a symbol of action and power, but in this card, they are open, indicating a lack of resistance or defense. This can be a sign of surrender, release, and acceptance. 

The "Open Hands" card may also represent a need for balance and harmony in relationships. It can indicate a desire to connect with others on a deeper level and to be receptive to their needs and desires. This card invites you to let go of any fear or hesitation that may be holding you back and to trust in the abundance of the universe. 

Keywords associated with this card include receptivity, generosity, release, surrender, harmony, and connection. It is a reminder to stay open to new experiences and opportunities and to approach them with a spirit of giving and receiving.
